page.title: 02RECREATION
page.content: Bishops Hall Leisure Centre was built in l98l.It is made of brick and stone. It contains 8 squash courts and two swimming pools, one small pool for babies and learners and one large pool for experienced swimmers. The Leisure Centre also has 2 playing fields, and a small park for children to play in when their parents are using the Centre. The refreshment facilities are vending machines, one for sweets, chocolates and crisps and one for hot and cold drinks.The Leisure Centre has no bar or restaurant.
